* Contact: Charlie23

* Model: VGN-SZ430N
* Website:

=== Current Issues ===
* Webcam doesn't work. (Bus 005 Device 005: ID 05ca:1835 Ricoh Co., Ltd)
* Microphone doesn't work.
* Fingerprint reader doesn't work, even after having thinkfinger 0.3 installed. (Bus 003 Device 002: ID 0483:2016 SGS Thomson Microelectronics Fingerprint Reader)
* Brightness and contrast are screwed after installation. Fixed after having NVIDIA restricted driver installed.
* Display resolution is set incorrectly and doesn't have widescreen (1280x800) resolution after installation. Fixed after having NVIDIA restricted driver installed.
